title: Da Erduo Yeye Lixian Ji
synopsis: In ancient times, the black hole master invaded the universe, and everything was dark. The big ear grandfather who guarded the heavens expelled the black hole master with the help of the mother of Nuwa, and the universe saw the glory. But for thousands of years, the black hole master has not died in illusory darkness. In the world, he injected evil energy into the little comet, shaped her into a generation of comet goddess, and instructed the comet goddess to form a "universal freedom army" in the heavens, disrupting the world and destroying the peace of the universe. So Grandpa Big Ears set off from Jueshan , Riding a green bull, carrying a happy son, and walking along the Dan River according to the heavenly picture given by the Nvwa Empress, embarking on a journey of twenty-eight nights. After refining the Beidou, tethering the sun, propagating the ecliptic, and supporting the moon, many battles, Finally completed the important task of recruiting twenty-eight lodges. Then, Grandpa Big Ears activated Ruyi Spoon and directed the 28 lodges to form a "Five-Color Skynet" and expelled the black hole cave owner to Jiuzhongtian. The goddess of comet was also closed by Grandfather Dears to study in the Jueshan Cultivation Cave Regret. Twenty-eight nights guard the moon goddess ascending to the sky, and they are arranged in 28 sky regions, each taking care of one side, and guarding the peace of the universe.(translated from iqiyi)
